A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Any hope that fans had for the new trilogy to redeem the franchise has now vanished to a galaxy far\, far\, away. Disney execs have no problem paying off critics and pandering to the stupidest and most self-adulating elements of modern American culture in order to sell merchandise and fatten their bank accounts. Star Wars has been turned into a steaming pile of turd\, and I do not plan on seeing any more SW movies Disney comes out with in theaters.
